duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute long-term account strategies to drive technology adoption and business transformation.
Present and engage with C-level executives and other business stakeholders to drive large-scale technology projects.
Define and lead the executive relationship strategy within the account and with AWS senior leadership for executive sponsorship and go-to-market opportunities.
Manage and orchestrate account team resources on behalf of customers, positioning and selling technology to new and existing clients.
Proactively grow customer knowledge and relationships within complex accounts and sustain business and sales performance in complex enterprise sales.
Ensure sense of urgency and diligence across the company, working in a global federated enterprise with multiple business units and influencing governance and policy.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree or relevant experience in Sales, Account Management, or Line-of-Business Management with P&L Ownership
